data.Sentence_cn: 去年我有过一次有趣的经历。
data.Sentence: I had an amusing experience last year.

data.Sentence_cn: 在离开法国南部的一个小村庄后，我继续驶往下一个城镇。
data.Sentence: After I had left a small village in the south of France, I drove on to the next town.

data.Sentence_cn: 途中，一个青年人向我招手。
data.Sentence: On the way, a young man waved to me.

data.Sentence_cn: 我把车停下，他向我提出要求搭车。
data.Sentence: I stopped and he asked me for a lift.

data.Sentence_cn: 他一上车，我就用法语向他问早上好，他也同样用法语回答我。
data.Sentence: As soon as he had got into the car, I said good morning to him in French and he replied in the same language.

data.Sentence_cn: 除了个别几个单词外，我根本不会法语。
data.Sentence: Apart from a few words, I do not know any French at all.

data.Sentence_cn: 旅途中我们谁也没讲话。
data.Sentence: Neither of us spoke during the journey.

data.Sentence_cn: 就要到达那个镇时，那青年突然开了口，慢慢地说道：“你会讲英语吗？”
data.Sentence: I had nearly reached the town, when the young man suddenly said, very slowly, 'Do you speak English?'

data.Sentence_cn: 我很快了解到，他自己就是个英国人！
data.Sentence: As I soon learnt, he was English himself!
